about_the_game:
Migranova is a game full of adventure and farming elements, players will live on a new planet and try to develop their own land. In this technologically degraded world, players need to survive by growing crops, fishing, exploring, and building good relationships with the local villagers. At the same time, players will also unlock secrets about their parents and the Earth, help save the planet, and become an adventurer on new adventures on different planets. The gameplay is rich and diverse, allowing players to experience a unique interstellar life, full of fascinating exploration and farming fun.

------

Peculiarity

With a high degree of freedom, players can explore the map as they like, grow crops, improve crop varieties, raise animals, fish, repair and build their favorite buildings, develop technology, and explore new planets with different characteristics. Of course, there are many dangers waiting for you.

Do a good job with the villagers, become a real part of the Cuttlefish town, with the deepening of the relationship with the villagers, you can get more useful information to facilitate the war adventure. You can invite good friends to your home, or you can participate in festivals with them.

As you gather more items, you can identify more unknown plants and animals, which will be an important skill for you to cook better foods and potions.

Explore different kinds of caves to get more minerals and treasures you need, and there are many types of caves. Some are safe to explore, while others are full of dangers and challenges.

Hone your physical and combat skills. Dangerous caves and unknown planets are always full of challenges, and accumulating experience through constant combat can make you more comfortable in exploration.

Improve crop varieties to increase yield and quality. You will have the help of scientists in the migration, so that it is possible to improve crops, continuous research, and maybe even obtain new varieties!

Making potions, with the increase in the number of identifiable herbs, the variety and quality of potions will be increased.

Cooking delicious food, food is an important source of your energy and physical strength, making good food needs to have better materials, which is related to your ability to grow and identify.

My house is my house! You can customize the decoration of your room, and make the room look like you like!
